text: The only other cold cappucino drink I'm familiar with is Starbuck's Frappucino, and I like the illy issimo better.  There's more coffee flavor, and the chocolate essence is more like cocoa than chocolate.  If you've ever made hot chocolate with unsweetened cocoa powder, you'll know what I mean.  At 100 calories and only 6% carbs, it's almost health food!  I like that it's not too sweet.  I'll be buying this in the future.
